tiled.util
Class TiledConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  tiled.util.TiledConfiguration

public final class TiledConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides access to nodes in the user tiled preferences tree. In addition it provides a number of related convenience methods.

Version:
$Id$

addToRecentFiles

public static void addToRecentFiles(java.lang.String mapFile)
Adds the given filename to the top of the recent file list. It also makes sure it does not occur further down the list.

Parameters:
mapFile - the absolute path of the file to add, must not be null
